name: Gathr: UI/UX Case Study
description:
Event Planning and Ticket Sales Mobile App with Secondary Market - Case Study


Gathr is platform for event planning and ticket sales. Anyone can begin growing a local following that keeps up to date with their gatherings. We enable everyone to buy or resell tickets directly through the Gathr App, being the first of its kind to include a secondary marketplace for ticket reselling.


I created Gathr as a case study to highlight my expertise designing products from the ground up that can meaningfully impact a consumer’s experience. I built the features and functionalities along with the UI/UX - directing the user’s experience by creating an easy to navigate front-end on Figma that highlighted the solution and
